entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
